alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Morton; Stark (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 6:31PM CDT until September 04 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Morton County in south central North Dakota... Northeastern Stark County in southwestern North Dakota... South central Mercer County in south central North Dakota... * Until 730 PM CDT/630 PM MDT/. * At 631 PM CDT/531 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hebron, or 30 miles southwest of Beulah, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hebron around 635 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
